items.sentence: I must ask you a few questions and take a blood sample.
I think it's better you stay here until the snow stops.
Tom still has hair, but his brother is completely bald.
Tom was the one who showed Mary how to do it correctly.
I was born in 2013 in Boston, where I still live today.
Tom goes to Mary's house almost every day after school.
I'm not interested in tea ceremony or flower arranging.
Did anyone tell you that a burglar broke into my house?
Tom will never listen to anyone who disagrees with him.
I doubt that Tom can do that unless somebody helps him.
Tom wasn't the one who told me that Mary had done that.
Tom wasn't the one who told Mary she needed to do that.
I heard that Tom has come back to Boston for Christmas.
Tom and Mary were in Boston at that time, weren't they?
The room was quiet. Of course, it didn't stay that way.
The girl I went to the movies with is a friend of mine.
This is the sort of thing that you have to account for.
Don't talk back to your mother when she's scolding you.
This is the the pair of gloves that I bought in Boston.
This is a book that my teacher recommended that I read.
